pkgmetadata.longdescription: Build 'Docker Images' in 'Amazon SageMaker Studio' using 'Amazon Web Service CodeBuild' // Allows users to easily build custom 'docker images' https://docs.docker.com/ from 'Amazon Web Service Sagemaker' https://aws.amazon.com/sagemaker/ using 'Amazon Web Service CodeBuild' https://aws.amazon.com/codebuild/.
